A_SoundPath.title: Sound Filepath Schema
A_SoundPath.description: The filepath to the sound, starts with 'sounds/'

pitch.description: The pitch of the audio, 1 is nomial
pitch.title: Pitch

volume.description: The volume of the audio, 1 is nomial
volume.title: Volume

load_on_low_memory.description: Marks if this audio should be loaded or not on low memory
load_on_low_memory.title: Load On Low Memory

stream.description: If marked true then minecraft will stream the audio
stream.title: Stream

format_version.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.
format_version.title: Format Version
